title: Setup Dummy Infrastructure
description:
## Scope
Set up the foundational infrastructure for the dummy goal, including configuration files and basic scaffolding.

## Technical Details
- Create placeholder configuration files
- Set up basic directory structure
- Add any necessary dependencies

## Acceptance Criteria
- Configuration files are in place
- Directory structure is created
- Basic scaffolding is ready for the implementation story
guidance: This is a test story — create minimal placeholder files to validate the workflow.
doneWhen: Basic scaffolding and configuration files are in place.
avoid: Do not implement any actual feature logic — that belongs in the implementation story.
